title: My Pixel 2 isn´t turning on or restarting after downloading Android 10. Can anyone help?
content:
I downloaded the Android 10 update on my Pixel 2 and as usual it asks to restart to properly do the instalation, I accepted but the phone never turned back on, or restarted.
Ive tried to force reboot it and reset it and it´s just unresponsive.
